thread.title: Spectre: The new James Bond trailer is here - and it's awesome
thread.title_full: Spectre: The new James Bond trailer is here - and it's awesome

title: Spectre: The new James Bond trailer is here - and it's awesome
text:
Spectre: The new James Bond trailer is here - and it's awesome Spectre: The new James Bond trailer is here - and it's awesome Share 
James Bond fans rejoice – the new Spectre trailer is here, and it’s everything we hoped for. 
The new 007 movie – once again starring Daniel Craig as the world’s favourite secret agent – is released on October 26, and anticipation just got ratcheted up a notch wtih the release of the latest and final teaser. Watch the final trailer for #SPECTRE https://t.co/8zm77b0A7k 
— James Bond (@007) October 2, 2015 
We have helicopters, we have exotic locations, we have car crashes, we have collapsing buildings, we have Christoph Waltz (who definitely isn’t playing Blofeld, oh no) being cheerfully sinister… 
And there even seems to be a little nod to the classic Goldfinger “No, Mr Bond, I expect you to die” line in there too. 
Fans are very excited.
